channel.title: [Added] Proposed addition to the Organisation Registration Agency Codelist (Turkey)
channel.description:
The following addition to the Organisation Registration Agency codelist has been proposed upon request of a new publisher. Following successful approval from the IATI technical team it will be added to the codelist within a week.
Code: TR-MOI
Name: Ministry of Interior
Description: The Turkish Ministry of Interior has the 'Department of Associations' which registers: associations, political parties and unions
URL: www.dernekler.gov.tr/en/default.aspx
Public database: n/a

item.title: [Added] Proposed addition to the Organisation Registration Agency Codelist (Turkey)
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The Ministry of Interior has now been included in the org-id. register of organisation lists. For more information about the public launch of org-id.guide see this post.

Read full topic
